name: Elizord's Tale
storyline: A man named Elizord, once king was losing the respect of the inhabitants of his kingdom and slowly feeling angry and revengeful. He was granted a power to deal with all the attacks he suffered and the main character's mission is to stop Elizord's rampage.
summary: This is a first-person horror game with jumpscares that tells the tale of the character Elizord who gained a power to take revenge on everyone who mocked him in his kingdom.
